entry.title: A bloom between us
entry.summary:
Author: spawnofcake

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,976Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 37

Summary: “Um, Todd, do tell… where exactly did you get *that* atrocity?” Damian gestures to the flowers, his nose wrinkling in distaste.Jason turns to him, confused. “What do you mean? They’re sunflowers.” or Jason gets bullied by his brothers after bringing you flowers that he grew himself.
